paragraphs.ko: KeeBBear는 기계식 키보드 애호가들을 위한 종합 웹 플랫폼입니다. 현재 타이핑 연습 시스템과 키보드 스위치 테스터를 제공하며, 향후 스위치 - 키캡 호환성 체크 시스템, 키보드 추천 프로그램, 타이핑 게임, 키보드 빌드 로그, 커뮤니티 기능으로 확장될 예정입니다.
paragraphs.en: KeeBBear is a comprehensive web platform for mechanical keyboard enthusiasts. Currently featuring a typing practice system and keyboard switch tester, with plans to expand into typing games, keyboard build logs, switch compatibility check system, keyboard recommendation program, and community features.

en: Real-time CPM/WPM calculation and accuracy tracking
Performance visualization with charts and statistics
Login streak management for continuous improvement

description.ko: KeeBBear의 가장 특징적인 디자인 요소는 픽셀아트 게임에서 영감을 받은 보더 스타일입니다. CSS box-shadow를 활용하여 픽셀 단위의 정확한 보더 효과를 구현했습니다.
description.en: The most distinctive design element of KeeBBear is the border style inspired by pixel art games. Using CSS box-shadow, we implemented precise pixel-level border effects.

en: Multiple box-shadow layers for pixel-perfect borders
Retro gaming aesthetic throughout the UI

techBlocks.title: Frontend Architecture
items: Vue 3 Composition API: Modular and reusable component logic
Vuex State Management: Centralized state for user data, typing statistics, and game progress
35+ Vue Components: Clear separation of concerns (game logic, UI, controls, results)

techBlocks.title: Backend & Infrastructure
items: User authentication with email/password and social login
Real-time data synchronization for user progress
Secure user data storage with Firestore rules

techBlocks.title: Performance Optimization
items: Loading state management for smooth UX

challenges.title: Challenge 1: Real-time Typing Performance Calculation
challenges.problem: Accurate CPM/WPM calculation during typing without performance degradation
challenges.solution: Implemented optimized calculation strategies using Vue 3 reactivity system and debouncing techniques to ensure real-time performance tracking without impacting typing experience.
items: Implemented debounced calculation using Vue 3 reactivity
Optimized state updates to minimize re-renders
Used Web Workers for heavy calculations (planned)

challenges.title: Challenge 2: Loading State Management
challenges.problem: Preventing layout shift and ensuring smooth initial load
challenges.solution: Coordinated loading of critical resources (fonts, images, authentication) using Promise.all to ensure all assets are ready before rendering, preventing layout shifts and improving perceived performance.
items: Coordinated loading of fonts, images, and authentication
Progressive enhancement for better perceived performance

challenges.title: Challenge 3: Responsive Navigation Design
challenges.solution: Implemented adaptive navigation system that switches between horizontal navigation bar for desktop and hamburger menu for mobile, maintaining pixel-art theme consistency while optimizing for each device type.
items: Desktop: Horizontal navigation bar with pixel-art theme
Mobile: Hamburger menu with smooth transitions

takeaways.title: Technical Proficiency:
items: Vue 3 Ecosystem Mastery - Composition API, Vuex, Router
Firebase Integration - Authentication, Firestore, Real-time sync
Performance Optimization - Loading strategies, reactive programming

takeaways.title: Soft Skills:
items: Product thinking: Building for a specific community (keyboard enthusiasts)
Scalability mindset: Designing for future feature expansion
User experience focus: Optimizing every interaction
